
Why I chose it
--------------

- projects work how I work
- multiple vcs roots
- buildout support + external libraries
- lets you do stuff when it's "reindexing"






















Unique stuff
------------

- simple uncluttered ui
- appengine support
- django support
- multiple csv roots
- loads to productivity shit
